Title: Happy-Go-Lucky
Cast: Sally Hawkins Alexis Zegerman Samuel Roukin Elliot Cowan
Description: A look at a few chapters in the life of Poppy a cheery colorful North London schoolteacher whose optimism tends to exasperate those around her.

Title: Neulovimye mstiteli
Cast: Vasiliy Vasilev Viktor Kosykh Valentina Kurdyukova Mikhail Metyolkin
Description: Teenagers take revenge on cruel chieftains during the civil war. Soviet blockbuster in the best traditions of the western

Title: Salomé
Cast: Monica Carpiaux Michel Nedjar Carlos Palacio Mona Thomas
Description: A personal interpretation of Oscar Wilde Salome from three basic elements: the light the color and the projection speed.

Title: Tol'able David
Cast: Richard Barthelmess Gladys Hulette Walter P. Lewis Ernest Torrence
Description: When three thuggish men are responsible for the death of his father and the crippling of his brother young David must choose between supporting his family or risking his life and exacting vengeance.

Title: Anne of the Indies
Cast: Jean Peters Louis Jourdan Debra Paget Herbert Marshall
Description: In order to recover his ship impounded by the British former pirate captain LaRochelle agrees to spy on the notorious Caribbean Sea pirates Blackbeard and Anne Providence.

Title: Good Vibrations
Cast: Glenn Leyburn Cathal Maguire Peter Kelly Charlie Berkeley Jack Carberry
Description: A chronicle of Terri Hooley's life a record-store owner instrumental in developing Belfast's punk-rock scene.

Title: Affliction
Cast: Nick Nolte Sissy Spacek James Coburn Brigid Tierney
Description: A deeply troubled small-town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while other events jeopardize his sanity.

Title: Pale Rider
Cast: Clint Eastwood Michael Moriarty Carrie Snodgress Sydney Penny
Description: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

Title: The Intouchables
Cast: Éric Toledano François Cluzet Omar Sy Anne Le Ny Audrey Fleurot
Description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Chris Pratt Vin Diesel Bradley Cooper Zoe Saldana
Description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
